channel.title: Hi, Trying to start a server
channel.description:
Hi, I have already read the tutorial but for some reason it wont work
so i need help, my main problem is this
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd255/RedAzza/problem1.jpg[/img]
thats when i press the run.exe
With the compiler i get..
[IMG]http://i225.photobucket.com/albums/dd255/RedAzza/problem2.jpg[/img]
after 5 seconds

Now can someone link me to a good jdk

Thanks

item.title: Hi, Trying to start a server
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Dude, i would recommomend getting rid of your java versions, and starting again with them! Thats what i did, just go on add or remove programs n get rid of java, then go to

http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp

And click download

Hope this helped,

Johno

can someone link me to both of them

item.dc:creator: @Blain2007 Blain2007
item.description:
@Blain2007 wrote:

[quote=“Scarecrows, post:8, topic:235949”]@echo off
java -Xmx500m client
pause

or

@echo off
javac -Xmx500m client
pause

depends on your environmental variables, if you set them…[/quote]

i still get

How would i go about setting my eviroments

and also when you explain, pls give me the codes for paths you may say

i pmed u btw

And also if half my problem is the jdk i have, pls link me to a good one, preferbly the one your using

item.source: Hi, Trying to start a server

item.title: Hi, Trying to start a server
item.dc:creator: @Blain2007 Blain2007
item.description:
@Blain2007 wrote:

run.exe:

@echo off
title TestScape
Desktop\java\jdk1.6.0\bin
pause

Compiler:

@echo off
title Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
echo If the site does not show up, please go to: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Thank you for using Moo Dragons Compiler.
pause
exit
